pageContext.claim: “In the state of Arizona, over 36,000 ballots were illegally cast by non-citizens.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to have based this figure on dubious math offered by anti-immigration advocates, not any actual data. C. Murphy Hebert, a spokeswoman for the Arizona secretary of state, told FactCheck.org the president’s claim is false. “You must be a citizen to vote in an election in Arizona, so that number appears to be completely fabricated,” she wrote in an email.
